thread.section_title: Notepads Your Way Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Notepads Your Way | notepadsyourway.com
thread.title: Janet
thread.title_full: Notepads Your Way reviewed by Janet

author: Janet
title: Janet
text: At first I expected to be able to load the image to a work space and mess around with the wording and placement myself. After seeing that all I needed to do was enter the text and location, send the logo separately in an email, and have a short wait until I received the proof, that was pretty cool. I was able to email my changes and received another proof within maybe 2 hours... it arrived while I was doing other things. The whole process was very easy and the price was very good!
